reviews.review_msg: Dr Brown truly inspired me to go into crim. She made lectures so interesting and I loved her sense of humour. However, its not an easy A. Make sure to read ahead of time and take notes. She's going to make you work hard for that. She took us to watch the jury selection for Jamie Bacon which was awesome!

Im having online asynchronous class with her, but I find her notes and lecture videos not very helpful. The quizzes barely touch anything in those. Her quizzes are super short but makes up a huge percentage in your total grade!!! Theres barely room for mistake. You would want to go through every single word in the textbook if you want good grades.

Karen is the best instructor I've ever met so far. She not only has interesting lectures but cares about her students spontaneously. She takes every assignment strictly but gives lots of suggestions about the study and life to us. I can not merely comprehend criminology but learn a lot about good study habits in her class!!!
content is kind of hard but she makes it so much simpler with real life situations

Her lectures are great as she engages a lot with the students and uses funny examples. But she is a really tough grader and can be uptight about attendance and participation. Her exams rely mostly on her lectures but you won't pass if you ignore the text book and mentioned clips.
Easy subject with a good proof awesome class
Wonderful instructor and a gem of a person.
She interferes with your personal life .
She is really wonderful teacher! Evaluation is clear and lectures are quite interesting! If you want to broaden your mind, I would probably recommend her!
VERY INTERESTING LECTURE, VIVID EXAMPLES

She is an amazing professor with interesting lecture ! She is willing to help students and gives opportunity to students to visit law courts. Do revision regularly and be concentrate during lecture, worth to achieve better result !

she's amazing pro, show your enthusiasm and you'll get good grade prepare for your eaasy, try you best, she won't let you down to get good grade, you'd better read textbook ATTENDENCE is SUPER IMPORTANT !!!!!
Get ready to memorize tons of terms for this course. But the teacher is going to make life easier. cumulative Final. No quiz. Only Midterms and Final.
She is amazing!You should definitely take one course with her.
She is the best! Her class is never boring and she teach clearly and easy to understand. 2 midterms, 1 final and 1 paper all are easy to pass.
She is really good and kind. Help the students a lot.
Helpful,interesting and good sense of humour. Sometimes hard to understand but she really knows what she is doing.
The best Professor ever!!!!!
Super duper fun!
She is really awesome. Lectures are clear and interesting, midterms and exams are quite hard, but it's okay if your listen to her and read textbook. I wish I could take another course with her.
best
